Html:
I am only hours into this, and from my playing around with the API, I have a few questions.

1. Can I rename a folder?
2. If I cannot, if I create a new folder with the proper name, can I then move the tasks from the badname folder to the goodname folder.

I only ask this because I've been experimenting and now I'm trying to organize.

Thanks.

I know of no way to rename a folder or move items with simple API. As you suggested, you can create a new folder and then open each task in the old folder and then register it in the new folder and then delete the one in the old folder.
